title: [Health] New research has found that in the two months after China halted its zero COVID policy at the end of 2022, 1.87 million excess deaths occurred in that country

[Medicine] CRISPR-Cas3 gene editing system restores dystrophin function in stem cells derived from patients with Duchenne muscular dystrophy. Duchenne muscular dystrophy (DMD) is a muscle degeneration disorder caused by mutations affecting the dystrophin gene.
